scripts.test:integration: docker-compose up --build --no-color -d && docker-compose exec -T integration-tests bash /usr/src/app/bin/run_tests.sh
scripts.posttest:integration: docker-compose exec -T web cp /usr/src/app/.test_output/react-unit-tests.xml /usr/src/app/.output/ && docker-compose logs --no-color -t >> ./.output/service_logs.log && docker-compose down
